patterns: What's the special food at your restraunt?
responses: We have variety of cuisines available in our restraunt. You can order the food you like and have an amazing time with your friends and friends.

patterns: I want to book a party hall.
Is there a party hall at your hotel?
responses: Yeah there is party hall too in our hotel. For booking please contact the number 6735689267

patterns: Is there parking facility at your hotel?
is there valet parking at your hotel?
is there parking facility available at your hotel
responses: Yes. We have made sure to have enough space at our restraunt! Have an amazing time with your family and friends!

patterns: I want to give a feedback
responses: We would be glad to receive your positive and negative feedbacks from our customers. Please mail us ur feedback to our emal id: hotel2.0@gmail.com or you can also call 7653896745, Thank You

patterns: Can we order the food from swiggy?
Can we order the food from zomato?
Can we order the food from swiggy zomato uber eats or any other online platform?
responses: Yes you can order food from any of the online platform. We are glad to accept orders through online platform.

we also have a facility of online ordering food through our website. For other details please find order food button on the right side of the webpage. You can also order food through telephone-6528936782. Thank you

patterns: is there a bar at your restraunt?
responses: We also provide a wide range of drinks from alcoholic to non-alcoholic beverages.
There are both AC and non-AC rooms available. You can choose one as per your convinience. To know more including the costs please find lodge button on the webpage

patterns: how is the accessibility of your hotel?
responses: Our hotel is situated in the heart of the city and hence it is very accessibile. We have a bus stop and railway station nearby. We also cabs which can be used on prior booking, you can find the location details and route through our website

patterns: is there internet facility at your hotel?
responses: yes we do provide free wifi facility 24x7
